title: International
content:
Shaun Alexander, the former NFL MVP, and his wife Valerie are expecting their fourteenth child. The couple, married since 2002, already has thirteen children. They shared the news during a discussion about their faith-based homeschooling initiative. Shaun met Valerie shortly after being drafted by the Seahawks. The couple's strong faith and family values are central to their life together.

Jaguar Land Rover is gradually restoring its IT systems after a cyber-attack forced a complete halt to production. The company is prioritizing clearing supplier payment backlogs and restoring its global parts logistics center.

'Mamata di has made Bengal Sonar Bangla’: Hakim reacts to Shah’s Kolkata Durga Puja visit

Iran and Russia sign $25 billion agreement to build four nuclear power plants in Iran, IRNA says

European Space Agency warns against monopolies as satellite merger looms

Slovenia bans Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu from entering, citing ICC arrest warrant
